headline: Prediction: PepsiCo's Dividend Yield Just Peaked at 4.4% Because the Dividend King Stock Is Too Cheap to Ignore
summary: Unfortunately for frustrated investors, the stock price has gone practically nowhere for five years.  Pepsi’s dirt-cheap valuation and strong portfolio of brands make it a no-brainer buy today.  It's been a rough go of it for PepsiCo (NASDAQ: PEP) investors lately.

headline: Here Are My Top 2 High-Yield Dividend Growth Stocks to Buy Now
summary: The Vanguard Dividend Appreciation Index ETF tracks dividend growers, but has a tiny yield of 1.8%.  Two attractive and higher-yielding dividend growth stocks today are PepsiCo and NextEra Energy.  The Vanguard Dividend Appreciation Index ETF (NYSEMKT: VIG) is a popular exchange-traded fund (ETF).

headline: Pepsi crashes barbecues to rid them of Coke in latest stunt
summary: A new campaign insisting the soft drink goes best with grilled foods is timed to National Barbecue Day and includes a 60-second spot and an Instacart tie-up.
